home.title: Welcome to the Moon Solo Helper
home.play1: Play Welcome to the Moon against ASTRA, the Solo opponent.
home.play2: This application simulates the starship deck and counts ASTRAs points depending on mission and level.

turn.title: Turn {turn}
turn.accomplishMission: Flip mission card {value} to accomplished side

gameOver.title: Game over
gameOver.info: Game over - tally up your points.

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?

serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.title: Refresh Application
serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.notice: The application was updated - do you want to refresh to use the latest version?
